title: PMS 2.0 771 - Thursday Night Football Recap, NFL Week 8 Preview/Picks With AJ Hawk LIVE From The ThunderDome
description: On today’s show, Pat joins AJ Hawk, and the boys live from the set of College GameDay in Jackson, Mississippi, as they chat about last night’s Thursday Night Football game between the Ravens and Buccaneers, if the Bucs can be fixed or if they are broken, all the things going on in Tom Brady’s personal life and if that has anything to do with his play on the field, why the Ravens need to pay Lamar, Baltimore making adjustments in the 2nd half of the game, and everything else we need to know as we prepare for week 8 of the NFL season before Pat and AJ make their picks against the spread (1:38:08-2:01:13). Make sure you subscribe to youtube.com/thepatmcafeeshow to watch the show. We appreciate the hell out of all you. See you on Overreaction Monday, cheers.
dc:creator: Pat McAfee
